title: Liberated
description: 'Which is more important, your faith or the truth?'After the MECHs dominated Selestia and drove the Guardians underground, the world has finally begun to recover. With society relaxing into a state of harmony, Mellea can no longer deny the truth of what is happening to her. She is becoming a Speaker. However, as she begins to explore what it means to have a connection with the spirits, more dark secrets present themselves. With the weather around Selestia turning harsh and unpredictable, it becomes clear that not everyone is happy with the new regime. Doctor has one more trick up her sleeve, and it will cost a Guardian their life.Being on the 'same side' doesn't mean you can be trusted.
author: M.J.    Stevens
